snippet: “Men like to look,” Bob Guccione said. “I think if you took that away from them, they wouldn’t enjoy participating as much.”
lead_paragraph: “Men like to look,” Bob Guccione said. “I think if you took that away from them, they wouldn’t enjoy participating as much.”

headline.main: He Knew Men, He Knew Women
headline.print_headline: He Knew Men, He Knew Women
